content.name: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Capital Ship Loot Magnet
content.author: Assailer
content.description: [ТРЕБУЕТ ПЕРЕВОД] Player capital ships will be gathering inventory loot in a very large range. This will help clearing sectors from debris boosting your FPS and simulation speeds.
